comment: This professor is very helpful and generous when it comes to your grade. The class by far is not an easy one but professor Torres makes it worth it!

sweetest woman, i took this online and was afraid from what i'd seen here but she's amazing. she's a great grader and she really has the students best interest at heart. would absolutely take her again. yay prof torres !!!!
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Professor Torres was my favorite prof I've ever had. She is down to earth, funny and I feel like I learned a lot in a very safe environment. She's the kind of person that is willing to really engage with her students and is super down to earth. I loved this class!!!

This is the worst professor I have ever had like seriously. I wish she would provide better explanations or send out announcements with more information about the work she wants submitted. I had to use a third party just to explain her cumbersome instructions to me

I'm not sure if this is her first time teaching or not but she lacks in the department of consideration and communication, ironic for a communication professor. She does not properly communicate how she wants the work submitted and she will just continue to fail you w/o providing significant feedback. Save your time and money, pick someone else.

Every time I emailed her, she always avoided the main subject of my emails, was closed-ended with her responses, and did not want to be helpful when replying back. I have to be honest, it did get on my nerves. She is also a tough grader. "Can not use any pronouns" was NOT stated in any of her rubrics for the paper in the course. You've been warned.

The class is one giant paper you're writing throughout the semester, so the workload is generally pretty simple. She wasn't the best in providing good and clear feedback to help you improve, but she has extra credit opportunities with the writing center which can help your grade a bit.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--So many papers--Graded by few things

comment: I took COMM 2020 online. The class was pretty good. Not too many assignments. The majority of the semester is just working on one big writing project. The professor is pretty good at providing feedback and very good at keeping her D2lL organized and available with lots of resources to help in your literature review paper.

OMG. Very sweat,comfort, and understandable Professor. Every I enter her class, I am always smiling and understands what she says. There are games, extra credits, so more to help you. However, I was the one with the problem. I could have got A+++if I did not used  the advantage of the free time as a sleeping hours.

She is kind and gives substantive feedback on how to improve your paper as the semester goes on. If you make the changes she gives, you will have an A on the final paper by the end of the semester. The few times I spoke to her she was very helpful and caring.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment:
this was actually for COMM2020! 

shes one of the few teachers who actually read every single one of her students work. so no bs-ing this one. soooo much writingggg. good luck. its easy if you follow but I was lazy so yeah. I've had her in person b4 and it was better than this which is why I took her again...wayyyy different online lol
rating_tags: Tough grader--Gives good feedback--So many papers

comment: Couldn't have asked for a better professor. Legit made me consider switching majors

Her entry-level communications class is almost laughably easy. I went to every lecture but could have gotten the same grade if I had only done the assigned reading and assignments. We rarely ever stayed the whole allotted time. That being said, I did enjoy classes because we'd typically have a stimulating guided discussion. East-A intro class.
She was a nice professor, but sometimes got political. Easy tests and gave plenty of extra credit.

torres was a phenomenal prof. im 18 and she's prob the best prof I've had so far! everything within her class is searchable. we watched like 3 movies throughout the semester. mean girls being one of them. test was easy. you legit don't have to study everything is like common sense. you also do weekly one-page essays but they're abt you so its easy.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Graded by few things--Gives good feedback

comment: Don't even have to show up to class, but it can be fun. Everything can be completed online. Her assignments are easy and based on videos or movies you can find online. The quizzes from the textbook can be found on Quizlet. Two midterm exams online that are pretty straightforwards, pretty much follow the Kahoot she'll post beforehand. Super easy A.
I didn't even attend the class and still got any A in this class. The professor gives out a ton of extra credit. I recommend this professor, you won't regret your decision!!

This professor gives out a tons of extra credit and the test are easy along as you read the textbook. Attend the class because you will learn something new, and this professor gives out easy A homework assignments that will help you out at the end if you don't get the A.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Inspirational

comment: I recommend this professor for communication because she makes the class really interesting and its a easy A.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I recommend Dr. Torres for Human Communication because this is an easy A and You will enjoy the class activities. This class will help me get into Terry College and boost my gpa.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Participation matters--Clear grading criteria

comment: Take this professor, you won't regret your decision!
This is a easy Communication class for anyone who wants to increase their GPA!
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Clear grading criteria--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Super easy class and great Professor! I showed up to class about 30 % of the semester but was still able to pass with flying colors by reading the chapters. She gives weekly quizzes and homework assignments but they're not hard at all and neither are the exams. She prepares Kahoots for us to practice before hand and the tests are almost identical.

She gives a lot of work, but if you pace yourself, you'll get it done. There are quizzes at the end of every section of every chapter, as well as a test at the end of every chapter. The textbook is an online textbook. She also gives extra credit around finals, and the final is open notes. Its really easy. I finished it in 8mins & got a 90.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Participation matters

comment: Prof Torres is easily the best class I had and the only one I looked forward to. Everyday was something new. Not only that she even listens to students and prepares class around everyone's various leaning styles. If you wanna take this class, choose her.
If I could take all of my classes with this professor I would in a heartbeat. Hands-down one of my best experiences in college yet.

She is by far the best public speaking teacher. She would give great feedback on your rough drafts and she would make are class exercises fun. And her lectures were very interesting. Also before are midterm she had a kahoot to help us prepare and her study guide was very helpful. She is super funny, and nice I would highly recommend you take her.

Great teacher! Really cares about your grade and wants everyone to succeed. Attendance is mandatory, but so are a lot of other communication classes. Super easy class and light work load. Would take again.

Professor Torres made it extremely difficult to fail her class. She gave many extra credit assignments, made tests super easy, (straight from textbook readings and lessons) and cares a lot about attendance. Show up, do the work, and an A+ is so easy to attain!

Kylie is literally the coolest teacher ever, she's SO laidback. As long as you do your work and show up to class this is an EASY A. She makes it as easy as possible and gives loads of extra credit if need be. I highly recommend taking her.

I had a great experience with Professor Torres. I know public speaking can be an intimidating class, but I am so glad I took her. She makes giving the speeches so much more comfortable and she is funny which makes class fun. She does take attendance everyday, but offers extra credit to make up if you miss a class. I highly recommend her.
